A structured compensation and benefits program enable SPNM to implement an equitable and fair system that helps driving organizational performance. A competitive compensation and benefits program enable SPNM to attract, retain and motivate employees and it also encourages employee to provide their commitment, loyalty and improved productivity. The main purpose of this procedure is to set out the process and procedures to determine staff salary structure, ensure that staff are duly rewards for good performance and provides for compliance with statutory regulations.

In company, payroll can simply be stated as the sum of all financial records of salaries for an employee, wages, bonuses and deductions. From an ethics in business viewpoint payroll is a critical team in HR department as employees are responsive to payroll errors and irregularities: good employee morale requires payroll to be paid timely and accurately. The primary mission of the payroll department is to ensure that all employees are paid accurately and timely with the correct withholdings and deductions, and to ensure the withholdings and duductions are remitted in a timely manner.

Benifits and compensation packages also include over time, leave, incentive, provident fund, allowance and healthcare allowance, bonuses and much more. The HR department will play a key role in deciding on the benefits packages offered, as well as ensuring their smooth operation.
